title: Bruce Arians Steps Down; Baldy on the Big Stuff
itunes:title: Bruce Arians Steps Down; Baldy on the Big Stuff
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus and Gregg Rosenthal bring you all of the latest news in the NFL including Todd Bowles becoming the new head coach of the Bucs with Bruce Arians stepping away, the new overtime rule changes and Bobby Wagner heading to the Rams. Brian “Baldy” Baldinger stops by to go over all the “BIG STUFF” happening in the league.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
